title: 游戏崩溃模组RTM
author: QP小中
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// My bad.

Time: 5/2/20 11:47 AM
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
QP小中 发表于 2020-5-2 12:17
就是在这里下的
先删除config文件夹

再更新成这个试试https://c-t.work/s/f64465f806a148

replies.author: QP小中
replies.txt_content:
结城希亚 发表于 2020-5-2 11:53
删除RTM2.4.19-37_forge-1.12.2-14.23.2.2611.jar或NGTLib-1.12.2.jar
但是rtm模组要依赖ngtlib

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
QP小中 发表于 2020-5-2 11:55
但是rtm模组要依赖ngtlib
那就只删除RTM2.4.19-37_forge-1.12.2-14.23.2.2611.jar

看到下面的包名我下意识的把NGTLib也加上了

求操作

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
QP小中 发表于 2020-5-2 12:08
求操作
删除客户端.minecraft/config文件夹

或者更新模组的版本到最新版
[1.12.2-1.5.2][RealTrainMod——真实火车]新增相机、改进标记编辑、修复错误等
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-781058-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)
